i18n.unsupportedLocale: the requested locale is not supported

info.title: Information on this site
info.text: The data you enter on this site will be stored locally on your device (smartphone, tablet, computer) and will not be communicated to the server. After haveing completed the questionnaire, your device will generate a QRCode to be shown to the AME. This QRCode will contain all the information you have provided.

disclaimer.title: Consent to the release of information
disclaimer.text: I hereby authorize the release of all information contained in this form to the AME and, where necessary, to the medical assessor of the licensing authority. I am aware that such information will become and remain property of the licensing authority, provided that I or my physician will have access to them according to national laws. Medical confidentiality will be respected at all times.

form.info: Fill in the following fields. Information will be stored locally on your device.
